subject: Space and Astronomy
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The Russian astronauts Oleg Kotov and Sergei Ryazansky took an Olympic torch into space as part of the torch relay for the Sochi Games.
snippet: The Russian astronauts Oleg Kotov and Sergei Ryazansky took an Olympic torch into space as part of the torch relay for the Sochi Games.
